tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with the necessary structure for Laravel, React, and Supabase.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository. Set up the Laravel backend in a 'backend' directory and the React frontend in a 'frontend' directory. Include a README file with project setup instructions.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the repository structure and ensure that both backend and frontend can be built independently.

subtasks.title: Initialize Git Repository
subtasks.description: Create a new Git repository for the project.
subtasks.details: Run 'git init' in the project root directory. Add a .gitignore file with common exclusions for Laravel and React projects.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify repository initialization by checking '.git' directory exists and '.gitignore' file is present.

subtasks.title: Set Up Laravel Backend
subtasks.description: Install and configure Laravel in the 'backend' directory.
subtasks.details: Run 'composer create-project laravel/laravel backend' to create Laravel project. Configure necessary environment variables in '.env' file. Ensure database configuration is set up for future Supabase integration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify Laravel installation by running 'php artisan serve' and checking the default Laravel welcome page.

subtasks.title: Set Up React Frontend
subtasks.description: Create React application in the 'frontend' directory.
subtasks.details: Run 'npx create-react-app frontend' to initialize React project. Install necessary dependencies like axios for API calls. Configure proxy to backend if needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify React installation by running 'npm start' and checking the default React page loads.

subtasks.title: Configure Project Structure
subtasks.description: Organize the directory structure and ensure proper separation between frontend and backend.
subtasks.details: Create a clear directory structure with 'backend' and 'frontend' folders at root level. Add any shared configuration files at root level if needed. Ensure proper .gitignore for both projects.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify directory structure matches expected layout and both projects can run independently.

subtasks.title: Create Project Documentation
subtasks.description: Add README and setup instructions for the project.
subtasks.details: Create a comprehensive README.md at root level with: project description, setup instructions for both frontend and backend, environment requirements, and any initial configuration steps. Include basic contribution guidelines.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify README contains all necessary information by having another team member follow the setup instructions.

tasks.title: Configure Docker Compose
tasks.description: Set up Docker Compose to run Laravel, Supabase, and Vite Dev Server.
tasks.details: Create a docker-compose.yml file that includes services for Laravel, Supabase, and Vite. Ensure that the services can communicate with each other and expose necessary ports.
tasks.testStrategy: Run 'docker-compose up' and check that all services start without errors and are accessible.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication with Laravel Sanctum
tasks.description: Develop the authentication system using Laravel Sanctum for secure login.
tasks.details: Set up Sanctum in Laravel. Create the /api/login and /api/me endpoints. Implement user authentication logic and ensure password hashing with Bcrypt.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the login endpoint with valid and invalid credentials. Ensure that the token is returned and can be used to access the /api/me endpoint.

subtasks.title: Install and Configure Laravel Sanctum
subtasks.description: Install the Laravel Sanctum package, publish its configuration, and run the necessary database migrations to enable Sanctum in the Laravel project.
subtasks.details: Use Composer to require Sanctum, publish the Sanctum configuration file, and run migrations to create the required tables.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the Sanctum package is installed, configuration files are present, and the database contains the Sanctum tables.

subtasks.title: Set Up Sanctum Middleware and API Authentication Guard
subtasks.description: Configure Sanctum middleware and ensure the API authentication guard is set up for protecting API routes.
subtasks.details: Update the 'api' middleware group in Kernel.php to include Sanctum middleware and configure the guard in config/auth.php.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that protected routes require authentication and unauthorized requests are rejected.

subtasks.title: Create Authentication Controller and Logic
subtasks.description: Develop an AuthController to handle user login, token generation, and user retrieval logic using Sanctum.
subtasks.details: Implement methods for login (issuing tokens), and retrieving the authenticated user. Ensure password verification uses Bcrypt.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login with valid and invalid credentials, and confirm tokens are generated and passwords are securely hashed.

subtasks.title: Define /api/login and /api/me API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Set up API routes for user login and retrieving the authenticated user's information.
subtasks.details: Add POST /api/login and GET /api/me routes in routes/api.php, linking them to the appropriate controller methods.
subtasks.testStrategy: Send requests to /api/login and /api/me endpoints and verify correct responses and authentication behavior.

subtasks.title: Test and Document the Authentication Workflow
subtasks.description: Thoroughly test the authentication endpoints and document the expected request/response formats and error handling.
subtasks.details: Use tools like Postman to test all authentication flows, and create documentation for API consumers.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure all endpoints work as intended, tokens are issued and validated, and documentation is clear and accurate.

tasks.title: Create Database Schema in Supabase
tasks.description: Define the database schema for users, clocking_days, and horas_teoricas in Supabase.
tasks.details: Use Supabase Studio to create tables: users, clocking_days, and horas_teoricas with the specified fields and relationships.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the tables are created correctly and that the relationships are established as per the PRD.

tasks.title: Develop Clocking In and Out Functionality
tasks.description: Implement the logic for users to clock in and out, ensuring only one entry and exit per day.
tasks.details: Create the POST /api/clocking-days/:date/clock-in and POST /api/clocking-days/:date/clock-out endpoints in Laravel. Implement validation to ensure only one clock-in and clock-out per day.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the clock-in and clock-out endpoints for valid and invalid scenarios, ensuring correct data is saved in the database.

tasks.title: Implement Coffee and Lunch Break Logic
tasks.description: Add functionality for users to register coffee and lunch breaks, with specific rules for time calculation.
tasks.details: Create the POST /api/clocking-days/:date/coffee-start, /coffee-end, /lunch-start, and /lunch-end endpoints. Implement logic to calculate worked seconds and overtime seconds based on breaks.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the break endpoints to ensure they correctly calculate time worked and apply the rules specified in the PRD.

tasks.title: Calculate Daily Worked Hours
tasks.description: Implement automatic calculation of effective worked hours and differences from theoretical hours.
tasks.details: Create a function in Laravel that calculates the total worked seconds and compares it to the theoretical hours defined in horas_teoricas. Update the clocking_days table accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the calculation logic with various scenarios to ensure accuracy in worked hours and overtime.

tasks.title: Develop User History View - List
tasks.description: Create a user interface for displaying a list of clocking records with relevant details.
tasks.details: Implement the /historial route in React to display a table of clocking records, including date, entry, exit, pauses, and worked hours.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure that the list view correctly fetches and displays data from the API and handles empty states gracefully.

tasks.title: Develop User History View - Calendar
tasks.description: Implement a calendar view for users to see their clocking records by month.
tasks.details: Create a calendar component in React that displays badges for hours worked each day. Implement click functionality to show detailed records for each day.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the calendar view to ensure it accurately reflects the data from the API and allows navigation to detailed views.

tasks.title: Design User Interface with Tailwind and shadcn/ui
tasks.description: Create a modern and responsive UI using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components.
tasks.details: Utilize Tailwind CSS for styling and shadcn/ui for UI components. Ensure the design is consistent with the PRD specifications and is responsive across devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct usability testing to ensure the UI is intuitive and meets design specifications.

tasks.title: Implement Testing Strategy
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy for both backend and frontend components.
tasks.details: Set up PHPUnit for backend testing and Jest for frontend testing. Write unit and integration tests for critical functionalities, including authentication, clocking, and UI components.
tasks.testStrategy: Run all tests and ensure they pass successfully, covering edge cases and error handling.

tasks.title: Deploy Application
tasks.description: Prepare and deploy the application using Docker Compose for local and production environments.
tasks.details: Create deployment scripts and documentation for running the application in production. Ensure all services are configured correctly for deployment.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy the application and verify that all functionalities work as expected in the production environment.
